description:
I had Hayden come out for a solo, and I left a little extra time on his second day to see if he wanted to do a Serviced video. Ya know, scope out the studios, see if it was all cool, then decide.
Thankfully he said yes, and I have to admit, working with him was likely one of the easiest Serviced videos I have done.
Not only was he easy to keep hard, but if you watch his face, he is constantly looking up trying to think of Not Cumming. The boy never even looked at the straight porn playing for him.
With a little bit of direction, he was real good at showing off his ass to us, and I swear it turned him on even more. I had to be careful to not make him nut that way!
I flipped him on over and it took very little effort to make him bust.
He had fun and did say it was one of the best blow jobs he has had. Not sure he can go beyond getting head though. But his look is so masculine straight construction worker, that I hope he changes his mind.
Who knows? Things change, and I would love to have him part of my team!
title: Bryan & Hayden - Serviced
